Pros:
The ultimate PC videogame for hard core ultimate PC videogamers, this game is not only the ultimate challenge but this game will challenge you before you even launch it because you have to add "-nofbo" to your launch options or the game won't launch. Like a true 90's PC videogame you're not told this and just have to figure it out yourself like a real gamer.

This truly is the best game ever. I wasn't even alive when this game came out, but today, 2021, I still find it enjoyable. The graphics may not be on tier with Cyberpunk 2077, but thats not what i care about. What I care about is gameplay. The gameplay is exquisite, its honestly probably the best bang for your buck steam offers. Buy it, now, go!

Half Life feels like a chore to play. It's an old game and it plays like an old game. The guns feel like throwing darts at a fridge. It's possible to softlock yourself if you save incorrectly. One of the outdoor sections has an obviously visible skybox. The sound effects are poorly mastered and some of them are obnoxiously louder than others for no reason. Half of the NPCs look identical, and deliver lines like they're in a high school play.

If your are playing your way through some old classics like I was, give this game a miss.

Does it hold up it in 2021? No.  Soft locks are constant, fall damage is brutal despite VERY floatey movement mechanics, and the game demands exploring which doesn't coincide well with constant soft locks for a first play through with no objective markers.  I'm sure this game was revolutionary in 98', but its not worth your time in 21' unless you're wearing rose colored glasses.  If you want to appreciate a brutally flawed old school classic, then buy it.  Just don't expect a game as polished as the original doom

Capitolo iniziale della serie di Half-Life. Seppur ora possa risultare vecchio o antico, vi assicuro che ai tempi fu un ribaltamento completo del genere degli FPS. Infatti, la scommessa che fece Valve consisteva nell'accompagnare uno sparatutto in prima persona ad una "complessa" narrativa, la quale ai tempi si pensava come sconsiderata, dato che titoli come DOOM vendevano benissimo basandosi completamente sul gameplay e veramente poco sulla parte narrativa. Seppur in pochi credevano al suo successo, nonostante le difficolt√† Valve rilasci√≤ Half-Life, ed √® ora considerato da molti come uno dei migliori FPS mai realizzati in assoluto. Vi assicuro che Half-Life √® un videogioco eccezionale, e il gameplay √® lungi dall'essere noioso, ma anzi, ogni zona √® diversa dalla precedente e dovrete sempre trovare la soluzione all'enigma per proseguire. E se comunque non vi ho convinto all'acquisto, acquistatelo comunque per poi dirigervi direttamente ad Half-Life 2, il seguito di questo capitolo, il quale √® considerabile un FPS "moderno" di gran lunga superiore al primo. In sostanza, giocate questo e fiondatevi su Half-Life 2.
